subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray overwhelmed Andy Roddick, 6-3, 6-1, to reach the final at Queen’s Club in London. He will play Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in Sunday’s final.
snippet: Andy Murray overwhelmed Andy Roddick, 6-3, 6-1, to reach the final at Queen’s Club in London. He will play Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in Sunday’s final.
